name: Stage9 Design System
description: Modern Noir Cinematic UI - A dark, premium design system blending sleek digital minimalism with subtle analog vibes

philosophy: Dark, moody, premium aesthetic with luxury typography
Generous negative space for breathing room
Glowing orange accents for interactive elements
Smooth, polished feel with rounded corners throughout
Subtle depth and layers through shadows and gradients
No emojis - use SVG icons instead
interactionPatterns: Glowing effects on hover and active states
Orange glow shadows for selected/active states
Subtle animations (pulse, shimmer) for dynamic elements

iconography.style: Outline SVG icons with 2px stroke width
iconography.usage: Use SVG icons from Heroicons or similar libraries. Never use emojis.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure minimum 4.5:1 contrast ratio for text
accessibility.focusStates: All interactive elements must have visible focus states with orange glow border
accessibility.keyboardNav: All interactive elements accessible via keyboard
accessibility.aria: Use proper ARIA labels for icon buttons and complex components

guidelines: Sidebar collapses to icons on mobile
Grid layouts stack on small screens
Generous spacing on mobile for fat fingers

implementationGuidelines.fileStructure: Components in /components, Pages in /app, Styles in Tailwind config
implementationGuidelines.naming: Use descriptive, semantic component names (e.g., FeatureCard, ProjectCard)
implementationGuidelines.composition: Compose complex components from design system primitives
implementationGuidelines.consistency: Always reference this design system when building new features
implementationGuidelines.extensions: If new patterns are needed, add them to this file first
implementationGuidelines.showcase: New components should be added to design-system-showcase for documentation

customUtilities: Custom color scale for blacks and oranges
Custom font families (display, heading, body, mono)
